sentence.Network_en: But in the stock market is also an eternal topic congenially.
sentence.Network_cn: 而投机在股市中又是个永恒的话题.

sentence.Network_en: I have got an online friend recently, with whom I chatted very congenially.
sentence.Network_cn: 最近有一个网友, 聊得很投缘.
